DOC.brief_title: Morphine and/or Nalbuphine Adjuvants Ultrasound Guided Interscalene Block : Shoulder Surgeries
DOC.criteria: Patients schedule arthroscopic repair rotator cuff muscle tear shoulder . ASA physical status I ле . Infection site injection . Coagulopathy bleed diathesis . Known allergy drug study Preexisting neurologic deficit area block . Inability communicate investigator hospital staff . History chronic opioid use . Morbid obesity BMI > 40 .
